name: Laundry pickup & delivery Service for WooCommerce
author: ByConsole

sections.description:
Laundry pickup & delivery service for WooCommerce is a plugin that allow your customers to choose their desired pickup and delivery date and time for their laundry service orders on checkout page.

Control pickup hours to choose

You can set pickup hours in plugin settings page and customers will be allowed to select pickup time from your specified time range only.

Control delivery hours to choose

You can set delivery hours in plugin settings page and customers will be allowed to select delivery time from your specified time range only.

Include pickup & delivery date and time in email and on order details page as chosen by customer

This plugin show the desired pickup and delivery date-time on order details page and include same info in email notification both of customer and admin.

Choose your preferred date format

You can set what date format you want for customers to see on date-picker calendars, frontend order details/completed page and on customer’s email. as well as on admin side order edit/details page and on admin email.(Added on v1.0.2)

Get pro version here

Get Pro version

Features in pro version

1) Set up minimum days you need between a laundry pickup and delivery date. Allow customers to select dates by retaining that minimum days required for servicing.
2) Optionally allow same day laundry servicing by retaining minimum hours required for servicing.
3) Create pickup & delivery service routine separately for a complete week and that will be repeated on each week until you update it.
4) Can limit number of pickup / delivery per time slot.
5) Weekly close day for pickup as well as delivery service separately.

Features

  1. Ask user to select a pickup date and time as mandatory info.

2.Ask user to select a delivery date and time as mandatory info

  1. Show users their chosen pickup and delivery date time on order details and my orders page as well as order edit page in admin side.

  2. Show users their chosen pickup and delivery date time on new order email as well as for admin order notification email.

  3. Weekly closing days for laundry delivery & pickup service.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress “Plugins” screen directly by uploading zip through “Upload Plugin” button in “Plugins” -> “Add New” screen of wp-admin area.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the wp admin menu -> “WCLaundry Service” screen to configure the plugin.

OR

Search for “Laundry pickup & delivery Service add-on for WooCommerce” in “Plugins” -> “Add New” screen within your WordPress wp-admin area and click install button
sections.faq:
Which version of WooCommerce is tested with?

WooCommerce version 4.6.0 is tested with WordPress version 5.5.1 during release time of v1.0.1.

How to setup shipping charges?

This plugin does not interfere on shipping charge that is up to you how you setup shipping zones and classes.
sections.changelog:
1.0.3

i) Text domain matched for public translation.

1.0.2

i) Multiple date format added.
ii) Current date past time selection blocked.
iii) WordPress 6.1.1 compatibility confirmed.

1.0.1

Holiday setting added, so that you can disable some week day(s) for laundry pickup & delivery service.

1.0.0

First release with tagged version 1.0.0
